kDesc
Light, sort-of comfortable, covered in dubious stains. What more could you want from a camping seat?[#Legal]
Léger, plus ou moins confortable, couvert de tâches douteuses. Que demander de plus d'un siège de camping ?[#Legal]
Leicht, einigermaßen bequem und mit merkwürdigen Flecken übersät: Was erwartet man mehr von einem Campingsitz? [#Legal]
Leggero, più o meno comodo, coperto di macchie sospette. Cosa si può volere di più da un seggiolino da campeggio?[#Legal]
Ligero, más o menos cómodo, con manchas de dudoso origen: ¿qué más puedes esperar de un asiento de acampada? [#Legal]
軽くて多少は心地良い染み付きの椅子。ちゃんと座れるのであれば文句なし！[#Legal]
가볍고 편안한 의자입니다. 출처를 알 수 없는 얼룩으로 가득합니다. 더 이상 완벽한 캠핑 의자가 있을까요[#Legal]
Light, sort-of comfortable, covered in dubious stains. What more could you want from a camping seat?[#Legal]
輕巧、還算舒適，且沾上了一些可疑的污跡。這樣完美的露營長椅，你還可以要求些甚麼？[#Legal]
輕巧、還算舒適，且沾上了一些可疑的污跡。這樣完美的露營長椅，你還可以要求些甚麼？[#Legal]
Balder than a desert mole rat, these tires wouldn’t get you very far in a MotorStorm race, but add two planks of wood to the top and you’ve got yourself a handy stool. Genius![#Legal]
